1.title: Post-Thanksgiving Livestream
1.plot: To celebrate the aftermath of Thanksgiving, Thomas has a live stream chat with his followers, answers their questions and tells them about past, present and future projects.

2.title: Friends on the Other Side (A Mash-Up)
2.plot: It's Valentine's Day, but for Disney this V-Day is Villaintine's Day, so, no better day for Thomas and his friends to perform their latest single, "Friends on the Other Side", a mash-up of villain songs from various Disney movies.

1.title: Thomas Sanders Tries the Cup Song
1.plot: Thomas and a friend perform "Miss Me When I'm Gone" while doing the "Cup Song" routine.

2.title: Royals - Disney Prince Edition
2.plot: Thomas performs a snippet of "Royals" with the lyrics slightly altered.

3.title: Snow in Venice
3.plot: Thomas Sanders sings "Snow in Venice" by Elizavetha, with Jacob Fjeldheim on the piano.

4.title: How I Feel on the Weekends - Katy Perry Parody
4.plot: Thomas performs a snippet of "Roar" by Katy Perry with the lyrics slightly altered.

5.title: Advice for the Modern Day Princess
5.plot: Thomas performs a snippet of "Kiss the Girl" from "Little Mermaid", with the lyrics slightly altered.

6.title: Thomas Sanders Sings 'A Dream is a Wish Your Heart Makes'
6.plot: Thomas Sanders sings a jazz version of the classic "A Dream is a Wish Your Heart Makes" from Cinderella (1950) with Jacob Fjeldheim on the piano.

7.title: Thomas Sanders Vine Compilation September 2014
7.plot: Sanders Shorts (2013) compilation of September 2016 episodes.

8.title: Ask Thomas Sanders Part 1
8.plot: Thomas answers questions sent to him by his viewers on Vine and YouTube.

9.title: Nerds Are Cool
9.plot: Thomas talks about nerds, his own experience as a self proclaimed "nerd", what things he is nerd about and how nerdiness should be nothing to be ashamed of.

10.title: Happy Halloween (Don't Say Macbeth)
10.plot: Thomas talks about the infamous Scottish Play Curse, about how when someone utters the word "Macbeth" inside a theater, it curses the show. He talks about some awful (and funny) things that happened to him on stage related to the curse.

11.title: Thomas Sanders Vine Compilation October 2014
11.plot: Sanders Shorts (2013) compilation of October 2016 episodes.

12.title: Ask Thomas Sanders Part 2
12.plot: Thomas answers more questions sent by his viewers through Vine and Twitter.

13.title: Broadway Cares P4A 2014
13.plot: Thomas talks about AIDS and how the Broadway Care Charity fights against it.

14.title: Thomas Sanders Vine Compilation November 2014
14.plot: Sanders Shorts (2013) compilation of November 2014 episodes.

15.title: Thomas Sanders Vine Compilation December 2014
15.plot: Sanders Shorts (2013) compilation of December 2014 episodes.

16.title: Why Am I So Happy?
16.plot: Thomas speaks about how everybody asks him how he's always so happy, how he has his ups and downs like anybody else, and reminds that happiness isn't mandatory, and sometimes its just not possible feeling happy, and that's okay.

17.title: Thomas Sanders Vine Compilation January 2015
17.plot: Sanders Shorts (2013) compilation of January 2015 episodes.

18.title: Ask Thomas Sanders Part 3
18.plot: Thomas answers more questions from his viewers sent through Vine and Twitter.

19.title: Thomas Sanders Vine Compilation February 2015
19.plot: Sanders Shorts (2013) compilation of February 2015 episodes.

20.title: Prank Call Challenge with Leo the Giant
20.plot: Thomas and Leo the Giant make prank calls to some of their friends telling them the weirdest things and listening to their reactions.

21.title: Gender Roles
21.plot: Thomas speaks about gender roles, their impact in society and how they shouldn't govern people's lifes, saying that men should be able to do stuff traditionally assigned to women and viceversa.

22.title: Thomas Sanders Vine Compilation March 2015
22.plot: Sanders Shorts (2013) compilation of March 2015 episodes.

23.title: Thomas Sanders Vine Compilation April 2015
23.plot: Sanders Shorts (2013) compilation of April 2015 episodes.

24.title: React to That
24.plot: Thomas watches an episode of Kids React (2010) where the kids are reacting to his Vines and shows his reactions.

25.title: The Netflix Challenge ft. Mikey Murphy
25.plot: Thomas and Mikey Murphy play a game where they must guess the title of some movies based on their descriptions on Netflix. The loser must publish a pic of himself in an ugly pose on their Twitter account and read the comments.

26.title: Thomas Sanders Vine Compilation May 2015
26.plot: Sanders Shorts (2013) compilation of the May 2015 episodes.

27.title: The 6 Second Challenge with Matthew Schueller
27.plot: Thomas and Matthew Schueller play a game where they must perform different tasks in 6 seconds or less. Whoever gets most tasks completed gets to write any kind of tweet on the opponent's twitter account.

28.title: Thomas Sanders Vine Compilation June 2015
28.plot: Sanders Shorts (2013) compilation of June 2015 episodes.

29.title: Thomas Sanders Vine Compilation July 2015
29.plot: Sanders Shorts (2013) compilation of July 2015 episodes.

30.title: Ask Thomas Sanders Part 4
30.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

31.title: 7 Second Challenge
31.plot: Thomas talks about his most recent stage show, his portrayal of J.D. on "Heathers: The Musical" in Orlando. He performs a game with his cast partners asking them to do different challenges with a time limit of 7 seconds each.

32.title: Thomas Sanders Vine Compilation August 2015
32.plot: Sanders Shorts (2013) compilation of August 2015 episodes.

33.title: Thomas Sanders Vine Compilation September 2015
33.plot: Sanders Shorts (2013) compilation of September 2015 episodes.

34.title: Stage Mistakes
34.plot: Thomas tells a bunch of stories about bloopers that happened to him on different stage productions he was part of.

35.title: Thomas Sanders Vine Compilation October 2015
35.plot: Sanders Shorts (2013) compilation of October 2015 episodes.

36.title: Thomas Sanders Vine Compilation November 2015
36.plot: Sanders Shorts (2013) compilation of November 2015 episodes.

37.title: Yo-kai Pranks at ComicCon 2015
37.plot: Thomas infiltrates in the New York ComicCon characterized as an old man. In that disguise, he starts throwing his shenanigans to the ComicCon members and assistants, who are unable to recognize him.

38.title: Behind the Scenes at ComicCon 2015
38.plot: A look behind the scenes on how Thomas' make-up for Thomas Sanders: Yo-kai Pranks at ComicCon 2015 (2015) was made.

39.title: My Big Secret
39.plot: Thomas talks about how people ask him how he got so famous on Vine with so many followers, and he says that he doesn't know what people have seen in him that make him so "appealing", but tries to give some advice to new content creators.

40.title: Thomas Sanders Vine Compilation December 2015
40.plot: Sanders Shorts (2013) compilation of December 2015 episodes.

41.title: Thomas Sanders Vine Compilation January 2016
41.plot: Sanders Shorts (2013) compilation of January 2016 episodes.

42.title: Phone Prank Challenge Part 2
42.plot: Thomas and Leo the Giant do another prank challenge where they phone some of their friends, tell them the weirdest stuff and listen to their reactions.

43.title: Makeover with Ben J. Pierce
43.plot: Ben J. Pierce shows his expertise on makeup using Thomas as a model.

44.title: Real Life Pokemon with Brizzy Voices
44.plot: Thomas and Brizzy Voices play a game where the say real animal names as if they were Pokemon.

45.title: Define in a Vine with Hannah Hart
45.plot: Thomas and Hannah Hart play a game where they must define different concepts, with a time limit of 6.5 seconds each, as that's the time limit for a Vine.

46.title: Lefties vs Righties Challenge with Gabe Erwin
46.plot: Thomas is left handed and Gabe Erwin is right handed. So they play tasks they have to do with their less dominant hands. Whoever looses more challenges must post a pic of a writing of his name with his less dominant hand on his Instagram.

47.title: Thomas Sanders Vine Compilation February 2016
47.plot: Sanders Shorts (2013) compilation of February 2016 episodes.

48.title: Fact or Fiction with Meghan Tonjes
48.plot: Thomas plays a game with Meghan Tonjes where they tell each other different news or statements and they must guess if they're true or false.

49.title: Thomas Sanders Vine Compilation March 2016
49.plot: Sanders Shorts (2013) compilation of March 2016 episodes.

50.title: 15 Second Drawing Challenge with Romeo Lacoste
50.plot: Thomas and Romeo Lacoste play a game where they must draw different cartoon characters while blindfolded, and the opponent must guess who they are before 15 seconds of drawing.

51.title: Dance to It Challenge with Lilly Singh
51.plot: Thomas and Lilly Singh dance to different songs that are thrown to them randomly.

52.title: Thomas Sanders Vine Compilation April 2016
52.plot: Sanders Shorts (2013) compilation of April 2016 episodes.

53.title: Secret Playlist Live Surprise
53.plot: Thomas is doing a mini concert at Playlist when his friends throw him a birthday surprise right on stage.

54.title: Ask Thomas Sanders Part 5-1
54.plot: Thomas answers questions he has received from the viewers. He has received so many that he has to divide this task in two parts. This part answers the questions received on Twitter.

55.title: Going on Tour
55.plot: Thomas announces he's going on tour with a brand new musical, titled "Ultimate Storytime".

56.title: Thomas Sanders Vine Compilation May 2016
56.plot: Sanders Shorts (2013) compilation of May 2016 episodes.

57.title: Ask Thomas Sanders Part 5-2
57.plot: Thomas answers questions the viewers have sent him through Vine.

58.title: Thomas Sanders Vine Compilation June 2016
58.plot: Sanders Shorts (2013) compilation of June 2016 episodes.

59.title: 2 Truths 1 Lie feat. Ultimate Storytime Cast
59.plot: Thomas plays a game with his cast partners from "Ultimate Storytime". Each must say three sentences about themselves, but only one of them is true, and the others must guess which one is true.

60.title: Thomas Sanders Vine Compilation July 2016
60.plot: Sanders Shorts (2013) compilation of July 2016 episodes.

61.title: Thomas Sanders Vine Compilation August 2016
61.plot: Sanders Shorts (2013) compilation of August 2016 episodes.

62.title: The End of Vine
62.plot: Vine has just announced they're shutting down. Thomas comments his thoughts about this and announces what's gonna happen with his online career in the near future and after the death of Vine.

1.title: Halloween Thriller Vlog
1.plot: Thomas and his friends are making a Halloween vlog, when suddenly the light goes off. When it returns, Dominic is dead, and later disappears. The others panic as they disappear one by one while Thomas stubbornly wants to continue vlogging.

2.title: Never Have I Ever Challenge with Gabe Erwin
2.plot: Thomas and Gabe Erwin answer questions sent by Thomas' viewers on the "Never Have I Ever..." format, and they both answer "yes" or "no" to them.

3.title: Cartoon Chaos
3.plot: Thomas is joined by a group of cartoon voice actors. Thomas' viewers have previously sent him random phrases attached to one particular cartoon character, and the actors must deliver these phrases playing these characters.

4.title: Real Life Pokemon 2 with Brizzy Voices
4.plot: Thomas and Brizzy Voices deliver more animal names as if they were being said by Pokemon.

5.title: If You Need a Reason to Smile
5.plot: Thomas and his friends tell some positive news and facts that have happened on the year 2016, tell some jokes, and do anything they can to try and cheer up anyone viewing that might feel sad, depressed or in despair for any reason.

6.title: Thomas Sanders Vine Compilation September 2016
6.plot: Sanders Shorts (2013) compilation of September 2016 episodes.

7.title: Birds
7.plot: Thomas Sanders and Dodie Clark perform the song "Birds" from Thomas' stage musical "Ultimate Storytime".

8.title: I. GET. SEXY.
8.plot: Thomas' desperate to find a mate, so he decides to use courting techniques from different species of animals, with varying results.

9.title: Getting to Know You with Ben J. Pierce
9.plot: Thomas has previously sent his viewers several poll-like questions in a "X versus Y" format. He and Ben J. Pierce answer themselves each question and then try to guess what answers got the majority of votes from the viewers.

10.title: Reacting to Old Vines
10.plot: Thomas watches some of his oldest Vines from the Sanders Shorts (2013) series and shows his reactions to them.

11.title: I've Been Shipped with Jon Cozart!
11.plot: Thomas and Jon Cozart have been repeatedly shipped together by people. Now they do a test to check if they really are compatible, by answering both the same questions and trying to get both the same answer.

12.title: The Holiday 123s
12.plot: Thomas gives some advices on how to treat people on Christmas time, especially trying to remember there are people that feel most unhappy at this time of the year, so he encourages people to try to make them feel welcome and better the best they can.

13.title: Google Guess with Grace Helbig
13.plot: Thomas and Grace Helbig play a game where they type on Google incomplete phrases sent by the viewers on Twitter, and Thomas and Grace must try to guess how Google is going to complete the phrase on the results.

14.title: A Christmas Storytime
14.plot: Brayden asks his uncle Thomas to make up a Christmas bedtime story. Unconsciously, Thomas let's metaphors go about a recent breakup he was still mourning about, disguised as a Santa Claus story poem that helps him subtly unburden his pain.

15.title: Thomas Sanders Vine Compilation October 2016
15.plot: Sanders Shorts (2013) compilation of October 2016 episodes.

16.title: Thomas Sanders Vine Compilation November 2016
16.plot: Sanders Shorts (2013) compilation of November 2016 episodes.

17.title: Sanders Shorts Compilation December 2016
17.plot: Sanders Shorts (2013) compilation of December 2016 episodes.

18.title: Dance to it Challenge with Amymarie Gaertner
18.plot: Thomas and Amymarie Gaertner dance to different random songs that are thrown at them.

19.title: My Body Negativity
19.plot: Thomas talks about how when he gained weight he felt bad about himself, and says men do have body negativity too, but reminds that appearance doesn't matter. It's how the person is inside what counts, and everybody is beautiful in some way.

20.title: Warrior Girl
20.plot: Thomas and Deedee Magno Hall perform "Warrior Girl", from Thomas' musical "Ultimate Storytime".

21.title: Best Gift Ever
21.plot: Thomas shows some of the gifts his viewers have given to him while on the "Ultimate Storytime" tour and on other meetings, and gives his thanks to them, also for the best gift of all for him, the love and support from his followers.

22.title: Dad's Big Game Tips
22.plot: The Dad Guy gives some tips to enjoy the Superbowl Final event that is about to take place.

23.title: I Get My Own Soundtrack
23.plot: Thomas and his friend Chris Shaw create a full soundtrack for a day on Thomas' life.

24.title: I Can't Believe I Never Knew... Black History
24.plot: Thomas tries to answer some questions about black history that are thrown to them by some of his black best friends, Dahlia Johnson, Leo Anderson and Terrence Williams Jr.

25.title: Sanders Shorts Compilation January 2017
25.plot: Sanders Shorts (2013) compilation of January 2017 episodes.

26.title: Reacting to Old Home Movies
26.plot: Thomas shows some old home videos from his childhood and comments them.

27.title: Real Anime or Fake Anime
27.plot: Viewers through Twitter have sent Thomas plots that could belong to a real Anime or be made up by them. Thomas must guess if the plots that Dominic reads to him are fake or if they are real anime shows.

28.title: Sanders Shorts Compilation February 2017
28.plot: Sanders Shorts (2013) compilation of February 2017 episodes.

29.title: I Can't Believe I Never Knew... Women
29.plot: Celebrating Women Month in America, Thomas is joined by a group of women friends who throw some questions at him about women in history, and he must try to guess the correct answers.

30.title: The Voices of Unreason
30.plot: Thomas, Joan and Talyn give voice to the creatures that have been drawn by the viewers and sent to Thomas through Twitter.

31.title: A Lovely Night (La La Land Cover)
31.plot: Thomas and Ben J. Pierce perform a cover "A Lovely Night" from the movie La La Land.

32.title: Ask the Experts: Sports Explained by Non-Athletes
32.plot: Thomas and Joan try to explain sports to the viewers, but since they are not exactly experts on sports, their answers are probably not gonna be accurate, so to speak.

33.title: Storytime Madlibs
33.plot: Earlier, Thomas asked his followers on Twitter to submit short videos saying random words, sounds, making faces, movements, etc. He'll use some of them to fill in the gaps of different stories he narrates as the Storytime Guy.

34.title: Real or Fake Anime Part 2
34.plot: Once again, viewers have sent Thomas plots that could be either from real anime shows or made up by themselves. Dominic reads some of them to Thomas and he must guess if the plot is a real anime or if it's been made up.

35.title: Sanders Shorts Compilation March 2017
35.plot: Sanders Shorts (2013) compilation of March 2017 episodes.

36.title: Thomas Answers
36.plot: Thomas answers some questions sent by his viewers on Twitter, with the help of Joan.

37.title: Improv-able But Not Impossible
37.plot: Thomas and Joan test their improvisation level on acting by doing various sketches without a dialogue script and including some sentences being picked randomly from a cap full of papers with them written on.

38.title: More Reasons to Smile
38.plot: Once again, Thomas joins some friends to throw positive news and facts, jokes, and anything they can to try and cheer up anyone viewing who might feel sad, depressed or in despair for any reason.

39.title: I Can't Believe I Never Knew... Autism Acceptance
39.plot: It is Autism Acceptance Month, so Thomas is joined by a group of friends, some of the suffering Autism or Asperger's Syndrome, who throw at him some questions, and he must try and guess the correct answers.

40.title: Waving Through a Window
40.plot: Thomas, dodie and Ben J. Pierce join to perform a cover of "Waving Through a Window" from the Broadway musical "Dear Evan Hansen", which they have just seen together the night before.

41.title: Ask the Experts Part 2: Cars Explained by Non-Experts
41.plot: Thomas and Joan try to answer some questions about cars that are thrown at them by the viewers, but since they're not precisely experts on cars, their answers are not going to be accurate, to say so.

42.title: Voices of Unreason Part 2
42.plot: Viewers have sent Thomas more drawings with fantastic creatures they created, and Thomas and his friends give voices to some of them.

43.title: Storytime Madlibs Part 2
43.plot: Once again, Thomas has asked his followers to submit some video saying random words, making noises, doing movements, etc, and Thomas, as the Storytime Guy, will tell some stories with gaps filled with some of these videos chosen randomly.

44.title: Sanders Shorts Compilation April 2017
44.plot: Sanders Shorts (2013) compilation of April 2017 episodes.

45.title: Reacting to Old Musicals
45.plot: Thomas watches and reacts to some DVDs of stage musicals he has done in the past, including "The Forbidden Planet", "Jesus Christ Superstar", "High School Musical", "Hot Mikado", "Peter Pan", "Singing in the Rain" and "The Producers".

46.title: I Can't Believe I Never Knew... Asian Pacific American Heritage
46.plot: It's Asian American and Pacific Islander Heritage Month, so Thomas is joined by some friends of that ethnicity who throw questions at him about the topic, and he must guess the answers.

47.title: Blooper Reel
47.plot: Some of the bloopers on the filming on the previous Sanders Sides chapters are shown for a laugh.

48.title: Bestest Friend Tag
48.plot: Thomas and Joan throw some questions at each other to try and test if their long-term friendship is as strong and bonded as they think it is.

49.title: Sanders Shorts Compilation May 2017
49.plot: Sanders Shorts (2013) compilation of May 2017 episodes.

50.title: Playing Old Videogames
50.plot: Thomas, Joan and Talyn play three old videogames from Thomas' childhood. They score them before hand based on their memories, and after playing they update their score based on how they see them today.

51.title: Having Pride
51.plot: It's Pride Month, so Thomas, with a group of other LGBTQ+ friends speak about their experiences coming out and with their identities.

52.title: Voices of Unreason Volume 3
52.plot: Thomas and his friends give voice to some more creatures drawn by Thomas' viewers and sent to him through Twitter.

53.title: Let's Get Physical
53.plot: Thomas and Joan do a workout vid with several comical spins on it.

54.title: Yuri on Ice Live Watchalong
54.plot: Thomas and Joan do a live transmission where they watch the first two episodes of the anime Yuri!!! On Ice (2016) and a few episodes of Bananya (2016) and show their reactions.

55.title: YouTuber Mind Meld Part 1
55.plot: Thomas and a bunch of YouTubers and friends play a game where, in pairs of Thomas and one of them, they must tell one word each at the same time, then say other word in common with the previous said, and win if they say the same word.

56.title: Awkward Adventures: Competitive Cooking
56.plot: At long last, Thomas has decided to learn how to cook, and he does so with the help of Joan as a teacher. Later, Joan, Thomas and friend Drew compete against each other in a cooking competition in front of a jury composed of more friends.

57.title: YouTuber Mind Meld Part 2
57.plot: Thomas and a bunch of YouTubers and friends play a game where, in pairs of Thomas and one of them, they must tell one word each at the same time, then say other word in common with the previous said, and win if they say the same word.

58.title: Sanders Shorts Compilation June 2017
58.plot: Sanders Shorts (2013) compilation of June 2017 episodes.

59.title: Sanders Sides Behind the Scenes Q&A
59.plot: Thomas, Joan and Talyn answer questions their viewers have sent about the making of the whole season of Sanders Sides, showing also some behind the scenes footage.

60.title: The Things We Used to Share
60.plot: Thomas performs his first original single, "The Things We Used to Share", also showcasing his progress on learning how to play the ukulele.

61.title: Ask the Experts Part 3: Fashion Explained by Non-Experts
61.plot: Thomas and Joan try to answer some questions about fashion that are thrown at them by the viewers, but since they're not precisely experts on fashion, their answers are not going to be accurate, to say so.

62.title: Untold Family Tales
62.plot: Thomas and Joan have gone through a DNA analysis to check which countries were their ancestors from, and they play a bingo game with names of countries and Thomas' results as the draw. They also tell some of the history of their families.

63.title: Reacting to Old Vines Part 2
63.plot: Thomas watches some more of his oldest Vines from the Sanders Shorts (2013) series.

64.title: Sanders Shorts July 2017 Compilation
64.plot: Sanders Shorts (2013) compilation of July 2017 episodes.

65.title: Tweet Tunes
65.plot: Thomas asked earlier the viewers to send him some random words or phrases. Now Thomas and his friends sing several songs based on some of them.

66.title: My True Self
66.plot: His conversation with Anthony Padilla has made Thomas wonder if he's really showing his true self on camera. So he asks Anthony for some advice in order to be as true as he can for his followers.

67.title: Voices of Unreason Volume 4
67.plot: Once again, viewers have sent Thomas drawings with fantastic creatures, and Thomas, alongside Joan, Brizzy Voices and Michaela Dietz, will voice some of them.

68.title: Twister Truth or Dare
68.plot: Thomas and Hannah are both tipsy just after finishing filming a My Drunk Kitchen (2011) episode, and they're playing a game that is a mix between the Twister game and the Truth or Dare game, while Joan rolls the roulette.

69.title: Inspired Makeup Routines
69.plot: Ben J. Pierce creates several makeups inspired on Logan, Patton, Roman and Virgil, from Sanders Sides (2016) and uses Thomas as a model.

70.title: Sanders Shorts Compilation August 2017
70.plot: Sanders Shorts (2013) compilation of August 2017 episodes.

71.title: Real or Fake Anime Part 3
71.plot: Once again, Dominic reads Thomas some plots sent by the viewers and Thomas must guess if they're from a real anime show or if they were made up.

72.title: My Life with a Narrator: The Most Epic Storytime Ever
72.plot: A narrator tries to tell the story of a day in Thomas' life. But Thomas doesn't seem to pay much attention to the weirdest stuff that is happening around him, to the narrator's frustration.

73.title: What Do Dreams Mean?
73.plot: Joan throws different things that are usually dreamed and Thomas, Talyn and Dahlia compete to guess the meaning of those dreams.

74.title: Sanders Shorts Compilation September 2017
74.plot: Sanders Shorts (2013) compilation of September 2017 episodes.

75.title: Signing Cards and Q&A Live Stream
75.plot: Thomas is at the recording studio finishing a brand new song, and while he signs some cards, he answers some questions the viewers send him live.

76.title: Real or Fake Anime Part 4 - Horror Edition
76.plot: Once again, Thomas is going to guess if the plots read to him by Dominic and previously sent by the viewers belong to a real anime or are made up. This time, since it's Friday the 13th, all plots, real or fake, will be horror themed.

77.title: Live Watchalong! Food Wars on Crunchyroll!
77.plot: Thomas, Joan and Talyn join to do a live broadcast inviting the viewers to watch with them a few chapters of the anime Food Wars: Shokugeki no Soma (2015) and some more mini episodes of the anime "Bananya".

78.title: Dropping Hints...
78.plot: Thomas doesn't stop subtly reminding his friend that he owes him some money and wants it back "to be friends again".

79.title: Reacting to Sanders Sides Cosplay
79.plot: Halloween's over and lots of people have decided to dress up as the Sanders Sides (2016). So Thomas, who's geeking out, shows pics and videos sent to him, and also describes the characters of Logan, Roman, Patton and Virgil.

80.title: Storytime Madlibs - A Dark Superhero's Tale & More
80.plot: Thomas tells three more stories with gaps between them that will be filled with the viewers' videos. This time he has help from Joan and Talyn, and among the viewers' videos, there are some surprises from special "unexpected guests".

81.title: Sanders Shorts Compilation October 2017
81.plot: Sanders Shorts (2013) compilation of October 2017 episodes.

82.title: Real or Fake Anime Part 5 - Action/Adventure Edition
82.plot: Once again, viewers have sent descriptions of anime shows, some of them real and some of them fake, and Thomas must guess which are which. As a twist, Thomas will also make drawings depicting the plots, trying to help himself guessing.

83.title: Lesser Known Broadway Songs: Mystery Solo
83.plot: Thomas and his friends play a game where they throw each other snippets of songs from lesser known musicals and they must try to continue the song as they can in three rounds, first with music and lyrics, then with music, and then acapella.

84.title: Sanders Shorts Compilation November 2017
84.plot: Sanders Shorts (2013) compilation of November 2017 episodes.

85.title: Real or Fake Anime Part 6 - Comedy/Romance Edition
85.plot: Thomas gets in another challenge to guess which of the plots sent by viewers are from real animes and which are fake. This time, for each failure, he will get a pie on the face. If he gets more than a half right, his friends will be pied.

86.title: Break Announcement
86.plot: Thomas looks back at the resolutions from the song "Lies" from Sanders Sides: A New Year of Lying to Myself... In Song (2017) he achieved last year. "Take the time for me I need" is the only one left, so he announces that he'll take a break of a few weeks before his next video.

87.title: Sanders Shorts Compilation December 2017
87.plot: Sanders Shorts (2013) compilation of December 2017 episodes.

1.title: Blooper Reel: The Bloop Strikes Back
1.plot: Thomas shows a portion of bloopers from many episodes of Sanders Sides (2016), Cartoon Therapy (2017) and Thomas Sanders (2013).

2.title: Sanders Shorts Compilation January 2018
2.plot: Sanders Shorts (2013) compilation of January 2018 episodes.

3.title: Black History: Awesome Facts, Part 2
3.plot: It's Black History Month, so Thomas is joined by some of his friends, who throw him some questions about history of black people which he must try to guess, and then they tell him some interesting factoids about them.

4.title: Ask the Experts Part 4: Money Explained by Non-Experts
4.plot: Thomas and Joan try to explain money to the viewers, but since they are not exactly experts on economy, their answers are probably not gonna be accurate, so to speak.

5.title: Even More Reasons to Smile
5.plot: Thomas and his friends tell some positive news and facts that have happened lately in the world, tell some jokes, and do anything they can to try and cheer up anyone viewing that might feel sad, depressed or in despair for any reason.

6.title: Phone Prank Call Challenge 3
6.plot: Thomas and Leo reunite to do another prank call challenge. They have to call some friends by phone chosen randomly and tell them the strangest phrases also chosen randomly, trying to continue the prank for as long as possible.

7.title: Sanders Shorts Compilation February 2018
7.plot: Sanders Shorts (2013) compilation of February 2018 episodes.

8.title: I Won't Say I'm in Love: Disney Mash-Up
8.plot: Thomas sings his latest single, in a duet with Jamahl, Foti and Terrence, that includes a mash up of several Disney songs from all times.

9.title: Musical Tour: Announcements Video
9.plot: Thomas announces he's planning on a revival of the "Ultimate Storytime" stage musical and asks his followers to tell him where do they want him to go on tour. He also announces upcoming projects on Sanders Sides (2016) and more.

10.title: Sanders Shorts Compilation March 2018
10.plot: Sanders Shorts (2013) compilation of March 2018 episodes.

11.title: On the Borderline
11.plot: Thomas performs his latest single, "On the Borderline".

12.title: Remaking Old Vines
12.plot: Thomas takes a look back to some old Vines from the Sanders Shorts (2013) series and tries to remake and improve them with the advantage of being free of the old Vine time limit of six seconds and higher tech possibilities developed over years.

13.title: Remaking Old Vines Part 2
13.plot: Thomas looks back to some more of his old Vines he's not particularly fond of and tries to remake and improve them with the advantage of not being limited anymore to the 6 second lime limit of Vine.

14.title: Horror Videogames through the Ages
14.plot: Thomas, Joan and Talyn play horror videogames from different decades. Problem is, Thomas is not a fan of horror and he's not gonna have exactly a good time. In short, he's gonna scream his guts out, and Joan and Talyn are gonna love it.

15.title: Sanders Shorts Compilation April 2018
15.plot: Sanders Shorts (2013) compilation of April 2018 episodes.

16.title: Tongue Twisted: A Speaking Backwards Challenge
16.plot: Thomas and his friends play a game where they hear quotes from TV shows, movies or songs played backwards, and they try to mimic what they heard, to see if, when played backwards, they look like the original or it's a hilarious mess.

17.title: Sanders Shorts Compilation May 2018
17.plot: Sanders Shorts (2013) compilation of May 2018 episodes.

18.title: Sanders Shorts Compilation June 2018
18.plot: Sanders Shorts (2013) compilation of June 2018 episodes.

19.title: Voices of Unreason Volume 5
19.plot: Once again, Thomas and his friends give voice to many of the creatures of which viewers have sent drawings from via Twitter.

20.title: Sanders Shorts Compilation July 2018
20.plot: Sanders Shorts (2013) compilation of July 2018 episodes.

21.title: Bestest Friend Tag with Terrence
21.plot: Thomas announces that Terrence is moving away, so as a way of bidding him farewell and to commemorate their friendship, they play the Bestest Friend Tag Game, where they make questions to each other to see how well they know each other.

22.title: Sanders Shorts Compilation August 2018
22.plot: Sanders Shorts (2013) compilation of August 2018 episodes.

23.title: Breathin (Ariana Grande Cover)
23.plot: Thomas performs a cover from the song "Breathing" by Ariana Grande, a song whose topic he's familiar to, as he also struggles with social anxiety.

24.title: Awkward Adventures: No Added Sugar for a Month
24.plot: Thomas, Joan and Talyn take the challenge to spend one full month without eating anything with added sugar and show what impact that has in their life and health.

imdb.title: Thomas Sanders
plot: _Thomas Sanders_ (qv) stars and hosts this series where he performs comedy sketches, sings songs, and brings visibility to important social issues with the help of his guest friends.
